system.sustained: Target individual opposes Psyker's -20 Willpower with Toughness, if target wins nothing happens, if they lose they suffer 1d10 Damage, +2 per Degree of Failiure, ignoring Armour and Toughness. If the target loses Test by 4+ DoF they immediately suffer a random Gift of the Gods, minor NPC's may be instantly killed by this at GM discretion, transforming into harmless agonized chaos spawn.
